articles.description: AC Milan striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic and Tottenham Hotspur winger Gareth Bale have both been tweeting about FIFA 21, EA SPORTS, Fifpro and more, so what is the truth behind the claims?
articles.content:
Zlatan Ibrahimovic has taken aim at EA SPORTS, the makers of the FIFA gaming franchise, taking to social media with claims that they have used his likeness without permission.
FIFA 21 was released O… [+6046 chars]

articles.author: By Rory Tingle For Mailonline
articles.title: Aston Villa captain Jack Grealish admits careless driving charges - Daily Mail
articles.description: The England international midfielder is accused of driving without due care and attention on the M42, the A446 and on Bodymoor Heath Road on October 18.
articles.content: Aston Villa captain Jack Grealish 'smelled of alcohol' when he reversed 'at speed' into parked cars before climbing out of his £80,000 Range Rover and slurring his words following a party during the … [+7561 chars]

articles.title: Cole Palmer: Man City's teen star hoping to follow in Foden's footsteps - Goal
articles.description: Juventus coach Andrea Pirlo insisted Cristiano Ronaldo does not receive any special treatment at the Serie A giants despite his superstar status.
